name: Orchestrator Agent
description: Orchestrates the task generation and execution

skills.name: Task Executor
skills.description: Orchestrates task generation and execution using MCP tools and A2A agent coordination. Understands Model Context Protocol and manages complex workflows.
examples: Plan my trip to London using available agents
Coordinate with HelloWorld agent to greet recommended places
Use MCP tools to find travel data and coordinate multiple agents

skills.name: Task Lister
skills.description: Lists current active tasks with detailed information about workflow status, task types, and dependencies

skills.name: MCP Explainer
skills.description: Explains Model Context Protocol capabilities, available MCP tools, and how the orchestrator coordinates with them
